text: Paula Carvalho (born 9 April 1965) is a former synchronized swimmer from Brazil. She competed in both the and . Paula's sister is Tessa Carvalho, who was her partner in the women's duet at the 1984 Summer Olympics. == References == Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian synchronized swimmers Category:Olympic synchronized swimmers of Brazil Category:Synchronized swimmers at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Synchronized swimmers at the 1988 Summer Olympics
title: Paula Carvalho
